text: Days after #UK, #Bahrain becomes second nation to approve sale & use of #vaccine against #coronavirus made by #PfizerBioNTech.Bahrain has recorded 87,000 #COVIDー19 cases & 341 deaths. However, no timeline for availability of #Pfizervaccine has been indicated yet.#COVID19 #MIG https://t.co/1esXa5tBbV
